item.title: Mob programming
item.description: What is it? As mobprgramming.org states: “All the brilliant people working on the same thing, at the same time, in the same place and at the same computer”

item.title: Principios de la buena programación
item.description: Principios de la buena programación Tras años de experiencia, la industria ha acuñado numerosos acrónimos que hacen referencia a buenas prácticas, y a los que a menudo hacemos referencia.

item.title: The SOLID Principles
item.description: S — Single Responsibility A class should have a single responsibility If a Class has many responsibilities, it increases the possibility of bugs because making changes to one of its responsibilities, could affect the other ones without you knowing.
